description.zh-cn: 本名倪聪，香港作家、编剧、评论家。与金庸、黄沾、蔡澜并列为“香港四大才子”。其作品以科幻小说《卫斯理系列》最为人所知，并以其鲜明的反共政治立场而闻名。
description.en: Ni Kuang, born Ni Cong, was a Hong Kong-based novelist, screenwriter, and critic. He was known as one of the "Four Great Talents of Hong Kong", along with Jin Yong, Wong Jim, and Chua Lam. His work is best known for the science fiction series 'Wisely Series', and he was also famous for his outspoken anti-communist political stance.

description.zh-cn: 香港著名武侠小说作家，倪匡的好友，鼓励倪匡创作《卫斯理系列》。
description.en: A renowned Hong Kong wuxia novelist and a close friend of Ni Kuang, who encouraged him to create the 'Wisely Series'.

description.zh-cn: 香港著名作家、词曲家、主持人，与倪匡、蔡澜一同被誉为“香港三大名嘴”。
description.en: A renowned Hong Kong writer, lyricist, composer, and television host. He, along with Ni Kuang and Chua Lam, were known as the 'Three Great Mouths of Hong Kong'.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡及香港的作家、美食家、主持人，倪匡的好友。
description.en: A Singaporean and Hong Kong writer, food critic, and television host; a close friend of Ni Kuang.

en: Four Great Talents of Hong Kong

description.zh-cn: 对香港四位著名作家的并称，包括金庸、倪匡、黄沾、蔡澜。
description.en: A collective title for four renowned Hong Kong writers: Jin Yong, Ni Kuang, Wong Jim, and Chua Lam.

description.zh-cn: 由倪匡、黄沾、蔡澜共同主持的亚洲电视经典成人清谈节目。
description.en: A classic adult talk show on Asia Television hosted by Ni Kuang, Wong Jim, and Chua Lam.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡创作的著名科幻小说系列。
description.en: A famous science fiction novel series written by Ni Kuang.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Ni Kuang.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港南区，是倪匡的逝世地点。
description.en: Located in the Southern District of Hong Kong, it is the place where Ni Kuang passed away.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡曾就读的香港高等教育机构，当时在此进修新闻系。
description.en: A Hong Kong higher education institution where Ni Kuang studied in the Department of Journalism.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Ni Kuang.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡的儿子，周慧敏的丈夫。
description.en: Son of Ni Kuang and husband of Vivian Chow.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Ni Kuang.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡的妹妹，香港著名作家。
description.en: Ni Kuang's younger sister, a famous Hong Kong writer.

description.zh-cn: 香港女艺人，倪匡的儿媳，倪震的妻子。
description.en: A Hong Kong female artist, Ni Kuang's daughter-in-law and wife of Joe Nieh.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡在1951年曾在此受训三个月。
description.en: Ni Kuang received three months of training here in 1951.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量，倪匡年轻时曾加入其华东公安部队。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China. Ni Kuang joined its East China Public Security Force in his youth.

zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区监狱局保安沼监狱
en: Bao'anzhao Prison, Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Prison Administration Bureau

description.zh-cn: 位于内蒙古的劳改农场，倪匡曾在此工作，后因被指控为反革命而从此处逃离。
description.en: A labor reform farm in Inner Mongolia where Ni Kuang once worked. He fled from this place after being accused of being a counter-revolutionary.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。倪匡因其年轻时在大陆的经历而成为坚定的反共者。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China. Ni Kuang became a staunch anti-communist due to his experiences in mainland China during his youth.

description.zh-cn: 笔名还珠楼主，中国武侠小说作家，对倪匡的写作影响深远。
description.en: A Chinese wuxia novelist under the pen name Huanzhu Louzhu, who had a profound influence on Ni Kuang's writing.

description.zh-cn: 香港报纸，倪匡在此连载其著名的《卫斯理系列》小说。
description.en: A Hong Kong newspaper where Ni Kuang serialized his famous 'Wisely Series' novels.

description.zh-cn: 由倪匡创作的著名虚构武术家角色，最初在电影中由李小龙扮演而广为人知。
description.en: A famous fictional martial artist character created by Ni Kuang, first popularized by Bruce Lee's portrayal in film.

description.zh-cn: 金庸的武侠小说，倪匡曾为其代笔部分章节。
description.en: A wuxia novel by Jin Yong, for which Ni Kuang ghostwrote several chapters.

description.zh-cn: 金庸小说《天龙八部》中的角色。因倪匡代笔时不喜欢此角色，便将其眼睛写瞎。
description.en: A character in Jin Yong's novel 'Demi-Gods and Semi-Devils'. Ni Kuang, who disliked the character while ghostwriting, wrote her to be blinded.

description.zh-cn: 台湾武侠小说家，与倪匡相交甚笃。
description.en: A Taiwanese wuxia novelist who was a very close friend of Ni Kuang.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影界的年度颁奖典礼。2012年授予倪匡终身成就奖。
description.en: An annual awards ceremony for Hong Kong cinema. It presented the Lifetime Achievement Award to Ni Kuang in 2012.

description.zh-cn: 香港主权由英国移交给中华人民共和国的事件。倪匡因恐惧中共统治而在1992年移居美国。
description.en: The transfer of sovereignty over Hong Kong from the United Kingdom to the People's Republic of China. Fear of Communist rule led Ni Kuang to emigrate to the United States in 1992.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡创作的一部具寓言性的科幻小说，描述一个东方城市因其优点尽失而灭亡，倪匡坦言该城市就是指香港。
description.en: An allegorical science fiction novel by Ni Kuang describing the demise of an Eastern city that loses all its advantages. Ni Kuang stated that the city represents Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国处理香港和澳门问题的基本国策。倪匡表示从不相信此政策。
description.en: The basic state policy of the People's Republic of China for Hong Kong and Macau. Ni Kuang stated that he never believed in this policy.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡的哥哥，中国化工专家。
description.en: Ni Kuang's elder brother, a chemical engineering expert in China.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡的弟弟，新加坡工程领域专家。
description.en: Ni Kuang's younger brother, an expert in engineering in Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 1957年秋入读联合书院新闻系，但未毕业。
description.en: Enrolled in the Department of Journalism at United College in the autumn of 1957, but did not graduate.

description.zh-cn: 1951年在此受训三个月。
description.en: Received three months of training here in 1951.

position.zh-cn: 华东公安部队基层军官
position.en: Junior officer in the East China Public Security Force

relationships.source: 内蒙古自治区监狱局保安沼监狱

description.zh-cn: 倪匡因拆小木桥取暖而被劳改大队书记指为“破坏交通”，罪名为反革命，并被隔离审查。
description.en: Ni Kuang was accused of being a counter-revolutionary for 'disrupting traffic' after dismantling a small wooden bridge for firewood, and was placed in solitary confinement for investigation.

description.zh-cn: 亦舒是倪匡的妹妹。
description.en: Yi Shu is Ni Kuang's younger sister.

description.zh-cn: 倪亦方是倪匡的哥哥。
description.en: Ni Yifang is Ni Kuang's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 倪亦靖是倪匡的弟弟。
description.en: Ni Yijing is Ni Kuang's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 周慧敏是倪匡的儿媳。
description.en: Vivian Chow is Ni Kuang's daughter-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡与金庸是好友，并列为“香港四大才子”。金庸鼓励倪匡创作《卫斯理系列》，倪匡也曾为金庸的《天龙八部》代笔。
description.en: Ni Kuang and Jin Yong were close friends and both part of the 'Four Great Talents of Hong Kong'. Jin Yong encouraged Ni Kuang to create the 'Wisely Series', and Ni Kuang also ghostwrote for Jin Yong's 'Demi-Gods and Semi-Devils'.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡与黄沾是好友，并列为“香港四大才子”，并共同主持电视节目《今夜不设防》。
description.en: Ni Kuang and Wong Jim were close friends, both part of the 'Four Great Talents of Hong Kong', and co-hosted the TV show 'Celebrity Talk Show'.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡与蔡澜是好友，并列为“香港四大才子”，并共同主持电视节目《今夜不设防》。
description.en: Ni Kuang and Chua Lam were close friends, both part of the 'Four Great Talents of Hong Kong', and co-hosted the TV show 'Celebrity Talk Show'.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡与台湾武侠小说作家古龙于1967年结识，相交甚笃，感情深厚。
description.en: Ni Kuang met Taiwanese wuxia novelist Gu Long in 1967 and they became very close friends with a deep bond.

description.zh-cn: 与黄沾、蔡澜共同主持该节目。
description.en: Co-hosted the program with Wong Jim and Chua Lam.

description.zh-cn: 1963年，金庸鼓励倪匡在《明报》副刊连载小说，促成了《卫斯理系列》的诞生。
description.en: In 1963, Jin Yong encouraged Ni Kuang to serialize a novel in the Ming Pao supplement, which led to the creation of the 'Wisely Series'.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡创作了《卫斯理系列》科幻小说。
description.en: Ni Kuang created the 'Wisely Series' of science fiction novels.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡创作了虚构角色陈真。
description.en: Ni Kuang created the fictional character Chen Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡曾帮助朋友金庸代笔《天龙八部》的部分章节。
description.en: Ni Kuang once helped his friend Jin Yong by ghostwriting parts of 'Demi-Gods and Semi-Devils'.

description.zh-cn: 因不喜欢《天龙八部》中的角色阿紫，倪匡在代笔时将她写瞎。
description.en: Because he disliked the character Azi in 'Demi-Gods and Semi-Devils', Ni Kuang wrote her to be blind while ghostwriting.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡表示影响他最深的小说作家为“还珠楼主”李寿民。
description.en: Ni Kuang stated that the novelist who influenced him the most was Li Shoumin, pen name Huanzhu Louzhu.

description.zh-cn: 第31届香港电影金像奖授予倪匡终身成就奖。
description.en: The 31st Hong Kong Film Awards presented the Lifetime Achievement Award to Ni Kuang.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡从不掩饰其反共立场，曾表示“爱国必须反共，反共才是爱国”。
description.en: Ni Kuang never concealed his anti-communist stance, having said, 'To be patriotic, one must oppose communism; opposing communism is true patriotism.'

description.zh-cn: 倪匡表示从不相信“一国两制”，并对香港的未来感到悲观。
description.en: Ni Kuang stated that he never believed in 'one country, two systems' and was pessimistic about Hong Kong's future.

description.zh-cn: 由于害怕中共收回香港，倪匡于1992年移居美国。
description.en: Fearing the CCP's takeover of Hong Kong, Ni Kuang emigrated to the United States in 1992.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡创作了科幻小说《追龙》作为对香港未来的寓言。
description.en: Ni Kuang wrote the science fiction novel 'Chasing the Dragon' as an allegory for the future of Hong Kong.
